articles.title: UAE Lifts Ban On Transit Flights From India, Pakistan, Other Countries - NDTV
articles.description: The UAE has banned passengers from many South Asian and African countries for several months due to the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
The UAE has banned passengers from many South Asian nations.
The United Arab Emirates will lift a ban on transit passenger traffic from India, Pakistan, Nigeria and other countries from August 5, th… [+1335 chars]

articles.title: Delta spreads 'like wildfire' as doctors study whether it makes patients sicker - AsiaOne
articles.description: LOS ANGELES - With a new wave of Covid-19 infections fueled by the Delta variant striking countries worldwide, disease experts are scrambling to learn whether the latest version of coronavirus is making people - mainly the unvaccinated - sicker than before. T…
articles.content: LOS ANGELES - With a new wave of Covid-19 infections fueled by the Delta variant striking countries worldwide, disease experts are scrambling to learn whether the latest version of coronavirus is mak… [+4258 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Infineon held back by tight supply, Malaysia plant hit by lockdown - The Star Online
articles.description: BERLIN: German chipmaker Infineon Technologies said on Tuesday it was battling extreme tightness in its markets as the latest wave of the COVID-19 pandemic disrupts production in Asia and inventories hit all-time lows.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Denmark's Axelsen wins Olympic badminton gold - New Straits Times
articles.description: TOKYO: Denmark's Viktor Axelsen convincingly won Olympic badminton gold on Monday in Tokyo, becoming the first non-Asian man to claim the singles title since 1996.

articles.title: Un-un-un-un-unbelievable: Chen Tianwen, 58, goes viral on TikTok with this scary stunt - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Veteran actor Chen Tianwen's latest clip on TikTok has gone viral, with more than 191,000 views within a day of posting. The behind-the-scenes footage showed the 58-year-old actor on the set of 2019 drama The Good Fight, doing his own stunt. A bla…
